explanation: The code compared the concatenated string to [s[i]+s[j]][::-1], which creates a single-element list and then reverses it (still a list), so the comparison was always between a string and a list and never true. I fixed it by reversing the concatenated string itself using (s[i]+s[j])[::-1], so the palindrome check works. (This fix directly addresses the incorrect use of list brackets around the string.)
